comment.author: 59410977@N08
comment._content: This again is not a prison, it was an exhibition sort of in the Lugogo indoor stadium, the structure still stands.

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: To clarify, our catalogue describes images from this piece (CO 1069/192) as "Exhibition of prison industries and handicrafts". The prison names that appear in these images are presumably the names of the prisons which produced the objects on display.
